title: Pls help me for this image also
content:
I want to know name of the font for the text from this image. I want it for as much as possible text we can find.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422033435im_/http:/typophile.com/files/JustinDuncan4%20copy_6012.jpg)

 [‹ Dirty Type ID Please](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422033435/http:/typophile.com/node/44286 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID please: Modern Sans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422033435/http:/typophile.com/node/44283 "Go to next forum topic")
author: artslons

comments.content:
‘TORBETT’ = [Banco](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422033435/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/banco/familytree.html)

‘AUTO PARTS’ = [ITC Eras](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422033435/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/eras/familytree.html)

‘Cedar Grove’ = [ITC Honda](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422033435/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/honda/familytree.html)

‘FABRICATIONS’ = [ITC Benguiat](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422033435/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/benguiat/familytree.html)

Post on the Type ID Board next time.
can i get font name for all the phone nubers?
See what [Lars and Steve](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422033435/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=122803) have gathered already …

D&L looks like [Revue](http://web.archive.org/web/20080422033435/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/revue) that has been slanted. I didn’t see that on the other link.

- Mike Yanega
